description: Try our easy to follow Pork Belly Cocktail Pieces recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Belly Cocktail Pieces Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Place a rack in a roasting pan and add about 1cm deep water to pan. Trim meatside of pork so it is an even thickness, if necessary. Dry rind with paper towel. Score with a sharp knife at 1.5cm intervals. Rub well with 1 tbs sea salt and season with pepper. Lay pork on rack, meat-side down. Bake for 30 minutes. Reduce heat to 190°C and cook 1 hour until golden.
Meanwhile, combine brown sugar, soy, fish sauce, chilli and ginger in a small pan. Stir over medium heat until the sugar has dissolved and mixture has become syrupy. Set aside.
Place pork rindside down on a chopping board and cut into small cubes. Toss with soy glaze to coat. Garnish with coriander and serve with cocktail sticks.
